languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} deals an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies with no adjacent allies.

traits.locale_text: The Fighter deals an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> damage to enemies with no adjacent allies.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} deals an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies with no adjacent allies.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} deals an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies with no adjacent allies.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}的目标周围没有其他敌人时，战士的攻击会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} deals an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies with no adjacent allies.

traits.locale_text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}的目标周围没有其他敌人时，战士的攻击会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Воин{/g} наносит +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно противникам, у которых на соседних клетках нет союзников.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} deals an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies with no adjacent allies.

traits.locale_text: Боец наносит +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g}</u> урона дополнительно противникам, рядом с которыми нет союзников.
Боец наносит +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g}</u> урона дополнительно противникам, рядом с которыми нет союзников.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}は、隣接する味方のいない敵に＋<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} deals an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies with no adjacent allies.

traits.locale_text: ファイターは、隣接する味方のいない敵に＋<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}のボーナス{/g}</u>ダメージを与える。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} inflige un +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} </u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional a los enemigos que no tengan aliados adyacentes.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} deals an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies with no adjacent allies.

traits.locale_text: El guerrero inflige un +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} </u> de daño adicional a los enemigos que no tengan aliados adyacentes.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} fügt Feinden ohne angrenzende Verbündete zusätzlich +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.

traits.locale_text: Der Kämpfer fügt Feinden ohne angrenzende Verbündete zusätzlich +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> Schaden zu.
